Thumbs.db

.vs/

*.suo

*.mdb.meta

# Unity crash reports

*.apk
*.aab

*.exe

# Blender

# Asset Store Tools
# /Assets/AssetStoreTools*

# Jetbrains Rider plugin
/Assets/Plugins/Editor/JetBrains*

# Exported objects, Consulo
ExportedObj/
.consulo/

# Android/Gradle
.gradle/

# Addressables and StreamingAssets
/Assets/AddressableAssetsData/*/*.bin*
/Assets/StreamingAssets/aa.meta
/Assets/StreamingAssets/aa/*

# Visual Scripting auto-generated files

/Assets/Unity.VisualScripting.Generated/VisualScripting.Core/Property Providers

*.log
*.crashlytics-build.properties

# Uncomment to ignore AssetStoreTools if needed
# /Assets/AssetStoreTools*
